findings.title: Token Supply Manipulation
findings.description: Lack of unlockedBalance variable reduction can lead to a situation where more VRSW tokens are released than described in the tokenomy.

findings.title: Secure Oracles Usage
findings.description: The code should have the ability to pause specific data feeds that it relies on. This should be done to protect a contract from compromised oracles.

findings.title: Centralized Fund Flow and Admin Dependency
findings.description: The system's fund flow is centralized, relying heavily on the admin/owner role, with many functions requiring manual intervention.
